item.description:
Back by popular demand!!! Immerse yourself in a potent field of transformation.

Through this dynamic meditation you will:

♦ Let go of stress and tension!
♦ Charge your system with creative vitality!
♦ Clear and balance each vital energy center!
♦ Awaken your sexual/life force Energy!
♦ Strengthen your Immune System!
♦ Release the past!
♦ Expand your orgasmic range!
♦ Ignite your Clarity!
♦ Embody your Personal Power!
♦ Realize your Ability to Manifest!

Develop your solo practice within the context of a potent, supportive energy field.

No previous experience necessary. Beginners welcome!
Wear loose, comfortable clothing. Bring a water bottle, and a mat, blanket and/or pillow for your comfort. We will be sitting/lying on a carpeted floor.

Friday, 7:30-10pm

$25 prepay through PayPal, or
$30 cash at the door

Brynn Bishop is a Tantric Educator and Empowerment and Pleasure Coach with over twenty five years experience in the fields of Somatics, Spirituality and Consciousness Relating. Brynn guides individuals and couples in clearing emotional blocks, and awakening and harnessing their Vital Energy to experience the fullest range of Pleasure in their sexuality, Intimacy in their relationships, and Purpose and Passion in their lives.

For a free phone consultation, or if you have any questions, please contact Brynn Bishop via email (organizer).

What past students have said:

“The Meditation was awesome: Deep, profound release for me - there's a real synergy in doing this as a group that I think inspires us to go deeper/open more as we hear and see others doing so... again... it's consistent 5 stars for me!” – Steve Clinkenbeard

“Such wonderful energy raised and feelings moved. When we started to merge voices, it was truly magical. What a great gathering of souls. I came in with a somber heart, but left with a beautiful smile inside and out.” – Laurie A

“It was very clearing and moving. I feel so integrated.” – Robert

“This meetup was very healing and integrating for me. I particularly enjoyed setting the intention to manifest something in my life....The more I practice the Integrative Chakra Breath Journey, the easier it becomes and the better I feel. " - Bob J
item.how_to_find_us: Plenty of free parking. Accessible by 89, 77, 79, 350 buses.
item.name: Integrative Chakra Breath Journey
